attributes.action: change the logo for the 2012 London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new logo for the 2012 London Olympics has just been unveiled. It resembles five jagged pink pieces, which in the words of Sebastian Coe, "will define the venues we build and the Games we hold and act as a reminder of our promise to use the Olympic spirit to inspire everyone and reach out to young people around the world." 

Comments on a BBC forum on the logo have ranged from "a mess" to "looks just like a window I recently kicked a ball through."

As a logo that will in part represent Britain for the next five years and will receive increasing scrutiny as 1012 approaches, we urge the Prime Minister to request the organising committee to reconsider the logo's design.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
